name: Fracture of Light
description:
A little Visual Novel based on characters created by Melt.
The current release includes the entire finished Prologue with further content in the works.
This story will follow the misadventures of Atlas, Nova and their soon to be roommate Prism who will have to overcome the obstacles that having a half-alien live with you, who you broke out of a research facility, bring to the table.

Credits:

Story: Melanie

Characters: Melt

Sprites: Jade
Backgrounds: Jade
                                Far less talented artist who tried her best
